title: Bilawal grieved over sad demise of Mufti Abdul Shakoor
content:
KARACHI, Apr 16 (APP): Chairman of the Pakistan Peopleâ€™s Party (PPP) and Foreign Minister Bilawal Bhutto Zardari has expressed his grief and sorrow over the death of Mufti Abdul Shakoor in a road accident.
He condoled with the bereaved family members of the deceased, according to a condolence message issued here late Sunday night.
He also prayed for the higher place of the deceased in Jannah.
